summary: Comprehensive testing of Railway Model Collection Management app completed successfully. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend functionality working perfectly. Dashboard, locomotives, decoders, and sound projects modules all functional with proper CRUD operations and frontend-backend integration.
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and root endpoint
Statistics endpoint with proper data structure
Full CRUD operations for locomotives (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Full CRUD operations for decoders (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Full CRUD operations for sound projects (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Navigation to all sections (Locomotives, Decoders, Sound Projects)
Viewing existing data (Arnold BR 151 locomotive, ESU LokSound decoder, BR 151 DB Cargo sound project)
Add New Locomotive form with basic info, functions F0-F2, and CV modifications
Add New Decoder form with sound capability settings
Add New Sound Project form with sound addition functionality
Form submissions and redirects working correctly
Statistics updating correctly after new items added
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (20/20 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all major workflows tested successfully)
